18  class schunkGripper
19  {
20  protected:
21  ros::NodeHandle _nh;
22  ros::Publisher _pub;
23  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<control_msgs::GripperCommandAction> _client;

32 
33  schunkGripper::schunkGripper(ros::NodeHandle nh) : _client("/iiwa/wsg50_gripper_action", true), _nh(nh){
34  bool serverS = _client.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0));
35  _pub = _nh.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("ack_griper", 1);
36  if(serverS) ROS_INFO("Gripper connection is established");
37  else ROS_ERROR("Failed establish connection to gripper action server");
38 
39  }
40  schunkGripper::~schunkGripper(){}
41 
42  void schunkGripper::closeGripper(){
43  _goal.command.position = 0.01;
44  _client.sendGoal(_goal);
45  bool reached = _client.waitForResult(ros::Duration(10.0));
46  if(reached) ROS_INFO("Closed Finger");
47  else ROS_WARN("Failed Closed Finger");
48  }
49 
50  void schunkGripper::openGripper(){
51  _goal.command.position = 0.054;
52  _client.sendGoal(_goal);
53  bool reached = _client.waitForResult(ros::Duration(10.0));
54  if(reached) ROS_INFO("Opened Finger");
55  else ROS_WARN("Failed open Finger");
56  }
57 
58  void schunkGripper::ackGripper()
59  {
60  std_msgs::Bool ack;
61  ack.data = true;
62  _pub.publish(ack);
63  }
64 }
